list: What is the goal of your website? What do you want users to achieve when they visit?
Do you plan to sell products or services on your site? This is important information as it affects various decisions.
Is this going to be a completely new website, or do you already have one?
Do you need me to handle the entire process, from design to launch, or do you already have designers or other partners lined up and only need me for development?
Do you have any rough designs or ideas for the site? Are there any websites similar to what you're envisioning?
Do you have the logo, content and images ready, or will you need help with those?
Do you have hosting and a domain name?
How much money have you set aside for this project?
What is the project timeline? Is there anything driving it to be done by a certain date?
Is there any other information I should know?
